name: Diversion Safe
description:
Most burgulars only spend an average of 6 minutes in your home.  Leaving them only enough time to look in the most common places a person would leave their valuables.

This diversion safe opens from the bottom to reveal it's secret department.

name: Taser Gun
description:
In these days and times you need to be protected.  This taser gun will render your assalent helpless so you can get away unharmed.

The TASERÂ® X26C comes with a laser for accurate
aiming. Includes 6 cartridges, case, training DVD, a
free one-on-one training with a certified officer.

The TASER X26C and TASER M26C Electronic
Control Devices (ECDs) are modeled after the
law enforcement-grade TASER X26 and TASER
M26. Equipped with field-tested TASER technology,
both models now bring you the unprecedented
take-down power trusted by thousands
of police officers every day.
The X26C and M26C use propelled wires to
deliver an incapacitating pulse that overrides
the sensory and motor functions of the nervous
system. This powerful Neuro Muscular Incapacitation
(NMI) technology can stop even the most
aggressive individuals, including those under the
influence of drugs and/or alcohol.

name: Women's Pepper Spray
description:
Safe and easy to use against your attacker.  The personal model features a flip-top safety cap that prevents accidental discharge and the finger grip dispenser helps with accurate aim.


- 1.4% capsaicinoids concentration

- 10% OC Pepper: maximum strength formula

- Flip-top safety cap: prevents accidental discharge

- Finger grip dispenser: for accurate aim

- Easy to carry: key chain and belt clip

- Personal model (net weight: 18 grams)

- Contains 10 short bursts

- Effective range of 10 to 12 feet

name: Stun Gun
description: A regular stun gun with 700,000 volts to protect you from possible attackers. Plus, this stun gun comes with an added feature other stun guns do not have. It includes a 130db alarm that can be switched on or off with the switch on the side. The on/off has 3 levels; off, you can turn the stun gun on, and you can turn on the stun gun AND the alarm. There is also a safety backup. When the wrist band is pulled and unplugged , the stun gun is disabled so it can not be turned against you.
